long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quick QR Generator

Transform your Chrome browser into a tool for generating QR codes with ease. This extension is user-friendly and perfect for anyone needing to quickly share web pages.

KEY FEATURES

Instant QR Codes: Generate a QR code for any webpage you are viewing with a single click.
Direct Downloads: Access and download QR codes in high-quality PNG format.
Easy Sharing: Upload QR codes to ImgBB and share them via a link, enhancing your distribution capabilities.
Convenient Copying: Easily copy the page's title or URL.
User-Friendly Interface: Clean and intuitive design that’s easy to navigate.
HOW IT WORKS

Open the extension on any webpage.
Automatically generate a QR code for the current page’s URL.
Optionally upload the QR to ImgBB for easy sharing.
Copy the page title or URL directly from the extension.
INSTALLATION TIPS

Reload tabs open prior to installation to enable the extension.
Note: The extension is not operational on Chrome Web Store pages or in incognito mode.
SUPPORT
For support or feedback, please contact our team. We are dedicated to providing a great user experience.
